attributes.action: Create a stable energy source without relying on or sharing with other nations as to our advantage
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We propose that the Prime Minister invest study into creating zero point energy to be used as a power source for everyday energy usage aswell as defensive and offensive technology to be used ONLY by the British Armed Forces and Britain as a country and under NO circumstances should this technology be duplicated or shared with any other nation/s or people/s no matter what relations may be with either. Also the technology should be guarded with the utmost security and secrecy.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/fossilfuels/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
